mapper.insert: insert into sbt_city (id, city, cname, pname, prov, region, rule, subdl, last_date, month, timestamp) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{prov,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{region,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rule,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{subdl,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{lastDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{month,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{timestamp,jdbcType=BIGINT})
